This was posted a while back on the Lean Zulip:

[LeanDojo](https://leandojo.org/)

[LeanDojo: Theorem Proving with Retrieval-Augmented Language Models
](https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.15626)

According to their description, LeanDojo is an open-source Lean playground consisting of toolkits, data, models, and benchmarks. Plus they also provide an LLM-based prover and a chatGPT plugin. 
All of this looks amazing and something worth learning more about.
